content.body: jschoi: You've been doing quite well here; thank you for the talk so far.

content.body: regarding this, I was thinking of this as how this overlaps with the pipeline operaor
but, i figured, that there had been discussion about this and there was a reason to exclude it
_if this is intended_ then the overlap betweeen pipeline and bind should have been much larger
content.formatted_body: if this is intended then the overlap betweeen pipeline and bind should have been much larger

content.body: however, i would say that if we have both, it is reasonable to say that bind this cannot be chained
re bind-this: it is very important that there's a way to do `array <operator> slice` without needing `slice` to exist on `array`.
